sn22.14:1.2: “Rupam, bhikkhave, anatta, vedana anatta, sanna anatta, sankhara anatta, vinnanam anatta.
sn22.14:1.3: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanayapi nibbindati, sannayapi nibbindati, sankharesupi nibbindati, vinnanasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.14:1.4: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn22.14:1.5: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
